T = int(input())

for t in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    #print(n)
    x = 1
    while (2**x -1) < n:
        #print(x)
        if (2**x - 1) % n == 0:
            print(int((2**x -1) / n))
            break
        x += 1

t = int(input())

    while x*(2**x-1) < n:
        x += 1
    print(x)

t = int(input())

for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    x = 1
    while n % 2 == 0:
        n //= 2
        x *= 2
    print(x)
